title: Google quietly launches “Switch to Android” app on iOS
content:
Switching between Android and iOS can be a pained experience, but there are generally helper apps that aim to make it easier. To move to iOS from Android, Apple’s “Move to iOS” app tends to work at times, and to move from Android to iOS, generally you’ll be using a mixture of apps and Google

The post Google quietly launches “Switch to Android” app on iOS appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google has quietly launched the "Switch to Android" app on iOS, years after Apple launched the "Move to iOS" app on Android. Check it out.
